Html:
Hi,
I try to use the library FreeImage.net 3.17.0 in my app (Asp.net 4.5 x64 app).
I've downloaded the library zip (FreeImage.NET_3.17.0.4.zip at CodePlex), copied to app folder and added reference in my project.
In my app_folder/bin I have also the FreeImage.dll 3.17.0 wich is provided too in the zip file.
At runtime, I have an error "Unable to load assembly 'FreeImageNET' or one of his dependencies...."

This error seems to be specific at the 3.17.0 version, since it is ok with a precedente version.

Does FreeImageNet.Dll have others dependencies than FreeImage.dll ?
Do you have an idea of wich dependency could be missing or how I can get the names of missing dependencies.

Thanks
Mab

Hi

There should not be any none .NET framework dependencies. I have never done something in Asp.net so I have no idea what could be causing this..

Regards
